TopicTitle: Thanks to this community for making these accomplishments possible!! :Updated with gallery:

Articles.Content:
So after 5 weeks now (bought this while on sale in ps store) I am truly sucked into this game. Although I see this experience could have been even more enjoyable on pc and without the struggle of obvious console nuances I actually just can't stop playing lol! So far I have managed a satellite network, orbital refueling station, mun landing/returns, minmus landing/returns and mining operation, Duna landing/return (my first apollo style and it was still tight on return with rcs de orbit), stable spaceplane design with 3k dv in orbit, and today my proudest accomplishment, Dres orbit and on my way to landing (a complete redesign of my Kerbollo I craft)!!!! 

After landing and researching how to upload photos from psn I will be adding pics. Thanks to all again!

 

Gallery: http://imgur.com/a/A3ZqmcU

              http://imgur.com/a/sYEe1DE

Edited January 22, 2020 by ShaggyTed
Mixup in gallery
I hadn't checked this sub for a while. People are doing some cool things.
